mapper.select: SELECT id, username, nickname, phone_number, email FROM worker;
SELECT id, username, nickname, phone_number, email FROM worker WHERE nickname = #{nickname};
SELECT id, username, password, nickname, phone_number, email FROM worker WHERE username = #{username};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worker(username, password, nickname, phone_number, email) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email});
mapper.update: UPDATE worker SET nickname = #{nickname}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, WHERE username = #{username};
